fin_intro: Finenex is a Kazakh fintech company engaged in the development and implementation of high-tech software solutions for various business areas.

resources_intro: On this section you can find the questions you are interested in and instructional videos
ans_inventory: Yes! Yoshop has a fiscalization system in the form of an online-register.
ques_payment: What types of payments are accepted?
ans_payment: Yoshop accepts cash, non-cash (QR-code, bank card) types of payments.
ques_work: Does YoShop know how to work with labeled goods?
ans_work: Yoshop works with marked goods (Reading and recognition of DataMatrix code).
ques_fees: What fees does YoShop have when accepting non-cash payments?
ans_fees: Without connecting to the network, the terminal is able to work: up to 12 hours (with active use), up to 48 hours (standby). Charging the device to 100% with a zero battery value takes 2.5-3 hours.
